## Feature Description
A clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature address? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

## Alternatives Considered
Have you thought of other ways to solve this problem?

## Use Case
Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful.

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Can't use De:dobe without it
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just an idea

## Alignment with De:dobe Goals
How does this fit with De:dobe's mission? (optional)
- [ ] v1.0 - Grok export improvements
- [ ] v2.0 - Multi-platform support
- [ ] General - Privacy/liberation technology
- [ ] Other - Explain below

## Additional Context
Any other information, mockups, or examples that might help.

## Checklist
- [ ] I've checked existing feature requests to avoid duplicates
- [ ] This feature aligns with De:dobe's philosophy (privacy-first, no paywalls)
- [ ] I've provided enough detail for the team to understand the request
